con:configuration.query: Select public.campaigns.id,public.campaigns.start_date,public.campaigns.end_date,public.campaigns.total_budget,public.campaigns.version From public.campaigns Where public.campaigns.start_date < '2014-03-18T10:23:00' And public.campaigns.end_date < '2014-03-19T10:23:00' And public.campaigns.name Like '%test%' And public.campaigns.goal_type = 'spend'
